title: Moroccan chicken tagine with preserved lemons and fennel
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon ground paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', 'ground black pepper', '4 bone-in, skinless chicken thighs', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 fennel bulb, trimmed and thinly sliced', '1 large red onion, thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced or more to taste', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained, divided', '240ml chicken stock', '140g pitted green olives, divided', '3 tablespoons harissa, or to taste', '1/2 preserved lemon, thinly sliced, divided', '1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger (optional)', '5 cherry tomatoes, halved, or more to taste', '35g toasted almonds']
